name: Blood in Baldur's Gate
summary:
Blood in Baldur's Gate is a community-driven free-to-play narrative browser game developed and published by Larian Studios. It served as a narrative teaser for Baldur's Gate III.

Set 15 years before the events of Baldur's Gate III, players are tasked with investigating a murder in the streets of Baldur's Gate. From June 19 to July 6 in 2023, the community could vote on which locations would be unlocked next. While the polls have ended, players are still able to follow in the voters' original footsteps.
